Name: Chaayos
Address: F-14/15, Mezzanine, 1st Floor, Inner Circle Connaught Place Near Woodland Showroom Central Delhi 110001
About: The concept of chai adda or "Tea Room" took centre stage in our country for many years, with discussions on life, society and politics happening over chai. It was a place that brought together the young and old, rich and not-so-well to do. A kadak chai and samosa shared after work, an irani chai with bun maska over meeting a prospective life partner, or a hot adrak chai in the morning to wake you up - chai was a part of every social setting for us. Yet somewhere along the line, this rich heritage of chai addas was lost and "Chaa" took a backseat - taken over by the multinational coffee chains, suddenly chai was no longer the beverage that we bonded over. Chaayos was born in November 2012 out of this premise - a contemporary interpretation of the chai adda, serving freshly made chai. Our focus is on serving your "Meri Wali Chai", a chai made exactly to our customers' liking the minute they place their order - be it an adrak tulsi kadak chai or a paani kam elaichi cinnamon chai. Our option of 12 add-ons gives our customers a total of over 12,000 ways to make their chai at Chaayos. Read less
Type: Breakfast, Cafe, Dineout Pay, Delhi Operational

Name: Anglow
Address: 57, Middle Lane Khan Market Near HDFC Bank Central Delhi 110003
About: Anglow is a Casual Dining restaurant and Bar which is the gatekeeper of the lost art of a niche cuisine, and its retouching of classics is a skill that is rare and exquisite. The restaurant serves a fusion of European and North Indian cuisines. The special Devilled Scotch Eggs is a personification of the Anglo-Indian name itself; an English dish with an Indian touch. The piped yolk along with the potato-based coating makes every half a fulfilling meal. The Shami Kebabs continue the same trend started by the eggs. Much thicker than regular shami kebabs, this classic has been mildly experimented with but, mostly kept the same. One thing common between the English and the Indians was their love of spirits and the Bar promises a wide range of heady and intoxicating spirits and drinks that are to die for. The Ginger Fume transports one back to the forest residences of the pukka angrez. The restaurant is perfect for Dinner dates, Office get-togethers, Brunches and unique food experience. Anglow is located in Khan Market, Central Delhi. Read less
Type: Breakfast, Happy Hours, Casual Dining, Bar, Delhi Operational

About: Dhaba recreates the ambience of the archetypical rustic highway eatery, complete with a truck mural, rustic interiors and servers dressed in traditional Punjabi garb. The ambience takes inspiration from a typical North Indian eatery dotting the highway - rustic wooden tables and chairs upholstered in vibrant traditional phulkari work, natural flooring, thatched ceiling, traditional lanterns and walls replicating the uneven mud painted texture of a village hut. The decor of the restaurant with images of Indian gods and goddesses, traditional pickle containers and an old radio belting out golden oldies from the black and white era of Indian cinema, transports one to another world altogether. The a-la-carte menu offers a tantalizing taste of wholesome North Indian cuisine, highlighted by signature dishes like tandoori kebabs, balti meat, baingan ka bharta and chef's special thali. About: Fabcafe is a Healthy Gourmet Dining with regionally inspired comfort food, Fabcafé gives traditional Indian cuisine a modern interpretation. As part of Fabindia Experience Center, the café shares the proud legacy of its parent company, Fabindia Overseas Pvt Limited. It’s a contemporary India-inspired ethos that is eclectic and vibrant that draws on the best of nature. The ever-evolving menu consists of innovative dishes that are made using local and organic produce. Fabcafe focuses on serving food that is fresh, simple and nutritious. Also, it’s a "No Refined Oils | No Refined Sugars” rule. The café believes in using alternate healthy ingredients like mixed grains, jaggery, desi ghee and almond milk in the kitchen. The Chocolate Cakes are made of almond flour, the much-loved Momos are wrapped in jackfruit flour and beetroot is used instead of potatoes in bestselling Tikki Chaat. In fact, there is a healthy filter to every dish – from Biryanis to Desserts. It has a nice and soothing ambiance for a memorable dining out experience. Fabcafe is located in Lajpat Nagar 3 near Moolchand Hospital. Read less

About: Fabcafe is a Healthy Gourmet Dining with regionally inspired comfort food, Fabcafé gives traditional Indian cuisine a modern interpretation. As part of Fabindia Experience Center, the café shares the proud legacy of its parent company, Fabindia Overseas Pvt Limited. It’s a contemporary India-inspired ethos that is eclectic and vibrant that draws on the best of nature. The ever-evolving menu consists of innovative dishes that are made using local and organic produce. Fabcafe focuses on serving food that is fresh, simple and nutritious. Also, it’s a "No Refined Oils | No Refined Sugars” rule. The café believes in using alternate healthy ingredients like mixed grains, jaggery, desi ghee and almond milk in the kitchen. The Chocolate Cakes are made of almond flour, the much-loved Momos are wrapped in jackfruit flour and beetroot is used instead of potatoes in bestselling Tikki Chaat. In fact, there is a healthy filter to every dish – from Biryanis to Desserts. It has a nice and soothing ambiance for a memorable dining out experience. Fabcafe is located in Fabindia Experience Center, Rojouri Garden. Read less

About: Cafe Culture is a pretty little cafe located in one of the most central locations in Delhi, Greater Kailash Part 1. Exposed white brick and a rustic theme marks the interior of the cafe which makes one feel like they are in a small European bistro. The place provides the diner with the perfect atmosphere to unwind and de-stress with friends and have heart-to-heart conversations over good food. Cafe Culture takes pride in preparing quality food which includes ingredients sourced from farms and keeping the simplicity intact. Their menu is a mix of indulgent soul food as well as healthier variants for the calorie counters. The cafe specializes in serving specially curated Italian and Continental delicacies, making the diners crave for more. Their signature dishes like the Pan-Seared John Dory, Smoked Piquilo Sandwich and the Summer Salad are fan favourites in their own right. The whole farm to table concept is something they have tried to integrate into their food as well as in beverages with utmost dedication and sincerity. Blue Tokai’s coffee and Anandani Himalayan Tea House’s teas are just some of their efforts to promote indigenous brands and ensure the quality as well. The innovative and fun breakfast menu has also been a big hit with the diners. Cafe Culture is the ideal place for experiencing that proper European Culture accommodated with a beautiful environment and lip-smacking food. Read less

About: The United Group announces REWIND, a neighborhood cafe, from the kitchens of Pre Independent India’s first café & United Group’s flagship restaurant – United Coffee House. United Coffee House, the iconic institution, holding fort since 1942, serves as a prelude to Rewind which is a chic, smart and more casual avatar of the former. Rewind is your neighborhood café spread over 2,900 Sq. Ft. with the capacity to host 100 covers at Mall of India, Noida. It brings your childhood memories, a step closer to home if being in NCR, you feel distanced from the legendary institution in Connaught Place. Showcasing the legacy of the legendary United Coffee House, Rewind looks forward to hosting you for an experiential dining rendezvous at the all-day dining restaurant with the UCH nostalgia and signatures intact. Rewind takes the UCH journey forward by creating a culinary culture unique to it. It is a warm and inviting space where you can linger on with friends or family for hours altogether or dash back to work post a quick, refreshing meal. At Rewind, we create experiences that are based on your memoirs – a place when you connect the past but live the present. United Coffee House was always an experiential restaurant, a rendezvous place. Rewind presents the same and provides different experiences at different times of the day. Read less

Name: Carl's Jr.
Address: 8-A, Main Market, M-Block Greater Kailash - 2 Near State Bank Of India South Delhi 110048
About: Diva – The Italian Restaurant, the first of the DIVA family, began 18 years ago with a kitchen and a dream in Delhi’s chic GK-2. Celebrating Italian fine dining in all its glory, the multiple-award-winning restaurant uses authentic ingredients, often flown in directly from Italy, to create modern Italian delicacies. Wine with food is a way of life in Italy. At Diva Italian, we pride ourselves in our extensive collection of award-winning wines – and even finer food! From handmade dough to handpicked herbs – every ingredient is given thought, making every dish special - be it an entrée, main course or dessert! PDA is the new buzz in the town, a martini bar housed on the ground of DIVA the Italian Restaurant, PDA - stands for PCO DIVA Agenzia. PCO who are experts in managing bars, has partnered with DIVA in this project to manage this interesting new bar which focusses on Martinis and unique Cocktails, the bar is famous for its in house GIN 'Infusions'. To compliment the cocktails; DIVA has curated a class apart menu serving - bruschetta, cheese plates, salumi plates, arancine and little bites in addition to DIVA's Classic Pizze. Unwind with the interesting cocktails and delicacies from home town Italy, for the latter head upstairs and join the celebration of flavours over supper. Read less

About: Fabcafe is a Healthy Gourmet Dining with regionally inspired comfort food, Fabcafé gives traditional Indian cuisine a modern interpretation. As part of Fabindia Experience Center, the café shares the proud legacy of its parent company, Fabindia Overseas Pvt Limited. It’s a contemporary India-inspired ethos that is eclectic and vibrant that draws on the best of nature. The ever-evolving menu consists of innovative dishes that are made using local and organic produce. Fabcafe focuses on serving food that is fresh, simple and nutritious. Also, it’s a "No Refined Oils | No Refined Sugars” rule. The café believes in using alternate healthy ingredients like mixed grains, jaggery, desi ghee and almond milk in the kitchen. The Chocolate Cakes are made of almond flour, the much-loved Momos are wrapped in jackfruit flour and beetroot is used instead of potatoes in bestselling Tikki Chaat. In fact, there is a healthy filter to every dish – from Biryanis to Desserts. It has a nice and soothing ambiance for a memorable dining out experience. It is located at Local Shopping Centre, Nelson Mandela Marg, Vasant Kunj in Delhi. Read less

Name: Crudo Juicery
Address: Radisson Blu Plaza, Delhi Airport, Block R, Mahipalpur Village, National Highway 8 Mahipalpur Near IGI Airport South Delhi 110037
About: For guests looking for an authentic ethnic experience, The Great Kabab Factory, even after 19 years, remains a go-to destination. Each day, the award-winning restaurant prepares six different enticing vegetarian and non-vegetarian kebabs prepared in six different styles, as well as curries, breads and biryani. The kebabs are shortlisted from TGKF’s vast repository of more than 450 recipes, many of them passed down across generations, to offer a new culinary experience daily. Guests can enjoy unlimited portions at a fixed price in a comfortable environment. The focus is on complex marinades and cooking methods that add flavour, distinction and style to the kebabs. You will be served an avalanche of food and it’s impossible for a normal appetite to eat it all. Don’t ask for seconds of anything until you come to something you just love. In our case, it is the Galauti Kebab. Read less

It’s a contemporary India-inspired ethos that is eclectic and vibrant that draws on the best of nature. The ever-evolving menu consists of innovative dishes that are made using local and organic produce. Fabcafe focuses on serving food that is fresh, simple and nutritious. Name: Citrus Cafe
Address: Taj City Centre Gurugram, Level 1 Sector 44 Near Huda City Centre Metro Station Gurgaon 122003
About: Detail, balance and variety – a known dictum of the Thai Cuisine come to life at the Thai Pavilion, where we believe that intricacy, textures, hues and aromas are as paramount as the final zing and zest of our choicest creations. Paying utmost attention to detail, prolific Master Chef Prajuab Shoosridam imbibes the lightly prepared dishes with strong aromatic components into a Vivanta twist as we carry forward the legacy of being a culinary destination for food connoisseurs and gourmands from across the world. The restaurant tastefully swanks of a succulent menu that is rooted in the re-discovery of the royal dining experience from the imperial cities of Thailand. The elements of sourness, saltiness, bitterness and sweetness, so important in Thai food, have been married together in a perfect blend of spices at this restaurant which known to serve the best of Siam on your plate. Thai Pavilion also boasts of an eclectic beverage menu with an array of Thai-based cocktails, mocktails, iced teas and martinis for an enhanced experience. Enjoy an excellent pairing of food with a fine collection of young and vintage wines. The two versatile private dining areas – separated by a collapsible partition – can be converted into a large exclusive dining area; giving way to the ‘Unique Dining Experience’ with a personalised chef that handcrafts your meal. Thai Pavilion is the proud winner of the “Best Thai (Fine Dining) in Gurgaon” award at the Times Food & Nightlife Awards 2015 to 2017 Read less
Type: Romantic, 5 Star, Fine Dining, Luxury Dining, Bar, Curfew

Name: The Brew Bar
Address: Taj City Centre Gurugram, 1st Floor Sector 44 Near Huda City Centre Metro Station Gurgaon 122003
About: Distinctive elixirs, gyrating music and mouth-watering eats in a vibrant setting come together to provide a spirited experience like no other. Tease boasts of a smooth transition through three inter-connected spaces, allowing guests to glide through the high-energy bar to a more intimate lounge area in an instance. Walk out to Tease Alfresco – a mystifying under the stars ambience to unwind with your friends and folks. This is also where seasonal Indian and western grills as well as contemporary sizzler delights add dimension to a drink. It’s all about being fresh, healthy, tasty and colourful in the glass, at one of the best lounges in Gurgaon. Stir it up as you binge on the fresh herb, fresh fruit, vegetable and spice based Detox cocktails that prudently replace sugar with jaggery, honey, setvia and maple syrup. Ever-exhilarating and buzzing with life, Tease has 6 cocktails personally cherry-picked by world famous mixologist Atilla Iskifoglu. Keep the vibe alive and ball the evening away as you choose your pick from revitalising cocktails like Bee’s Knees, a unique sense-gratifying melange created with the rare Manuka honey, which has anti-ageing and antibiotic properties, or the GurgaonPolitan, a tribute as grand in every dimension as this millennium city. All this and much more, lays the carpet for the evening. Jet set as the resident mixologist takes colour, form and style to a different plane. And if he’s in the right mood, enjoy some flair bartending as added revelry. Read less
Type: 5 Star, Happy Hours, Lounge, Luxury Dining, Nightlife, Bar, Curfew

Name: Minar Restaurant
Address: The Imperial Hotel, Lobby Level, Janpath Road Connaught Place Near Janpath Metro Station Central Delhi 110001
About: Designed by Rajeev Sethi, the celebrated cultural czar of India, The Spice Route reflects the journey of spices from the Malabar Coast in Kerala through Sri Lanka, Malaysia and Indonesia to Thailand and Vietnam. The restaurant is an overwhelming visual depiction of the art and culture that travelled with the spices through these regions, presented in a folk, religious and cultural fantasy of the Orient. The Restaurant, that was seven years in the making, is completely hand painted with vegetable and flower dyes by mural painters brought in especially from a temple in Guruvayur in Kerala with a tradition dating back to 3000 years. Designed on the principles of Feng Shui, The Spice Route is a treasure trove of antiques and is divided into nine different sections, each depicting part of the journey of life. Besides the stunning décor, The Spice Route boasts a menu that ensnares the taste buds of a seasoned food connoisseur. Orchestrated with passion by Chef Veena Arora, the menu crafted almost artistically is starred by gems such as Chemeen Thoren (Kerala style prawns, stir-fried with coconut, curry leaves and black tamarind; flavoured with mustard seeds), Tom Yum Kung (the famous Thai soup with prawns, flavoured with lemon grass, lemon leaves and galangal), Kung Nang Phad Khing (Stir-fried lobster with ginger and Thai black mushrooms, served in the shell), Kaeng Kheow Waan Kai (Chicken in Thai green curry with pea and cherry aubergines) and Phad Phak (Chef’s special stir-fried baby pok-choy with black mushrooms, flavoured with soya bean paste). Read less
Type: Romantic, 5 Star, Fine Dining, Luxury Dining
